reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan well-made with a perfect shade of soft pink and appreciate its thick, heavyweight knit that's ideal for chilly fall days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good buy for the price!!!
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater. I bought this on sale for 17 and was worried it would be cheap but it is so nice. The length is perfect and covers your butt without being so long it looks like a dress. The material is soft and good quality. The color is very nice. It works wor a pregnant belly, and definitely will still work after i have my baby too, and bonus because it isnâ€™t itchy at all!!!! The buttons dont looke cheap either. I will definitely be ordering a second colorðŸ˜ Read more
items.author: Isabella Amann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Very good quality. Great for around the house or to wear out. Fits true to size. Iâ€™m almost 6 feet tall and got a large. Sleeves are long enough for me. Read more
items.author: JenniferM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT OVERSIZED SWEATER!
items.body: Great Sweater!! It does run oversized! I bought one in an extra large and size down to a large. The sleeves on the extra large were long. I am 5â€™3. The sleeves on the large are not too bad, and I loved the fit.! Very comfortable. The apricot is a beautiful color and the white is more like an off-white which I love for fall. I could probably even size down to a medium. It does hide the belly and the butt if that is what you are looking for. A definite must have for fall. Read more
items.author: Carol Cappuccio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality, Better Than Gap!
items.body: I was VERY pleasantly surprised with the quality and length! This looks and feels like a cardigan from Gap or Banana Republic, not Amazon! It's not too thick, not too thin. It was 57F today and I wore it with a short-sleeve shirt underneath, and it was perfect. I ordered my usual size (Large) and it's THE perfect length (about halfway down the butt) and the sleeve length is perfect too. Not too short, and comfortably long enough to have that cute fall aesthetic look over half your hand. I machine washed it on Delicate (cold water), then air dried it. I first laid it flat on a drying rack, then when it was halfway dry I hung it on a thick plastic hanger. Once dry, there were no wrinkles or weird scrunches in the fabric anywhere. The shoulders did not sag or stretch out. In fact, I have a black cardigan from The Gap that doesn't wash/dry half as well as this Amazon one. Buttons are a nice big size (but not too big) and nothing about this looks cheap! Read more
items.author: Jenn K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized is spot on
items.body: I love this sweater/cover up. Very thick good quality and warm. I am medium usually but got a small and its perfect. Youâ€™ll think its bulky but its oversized and thats how its suppose to fit. I got the tan beige one & it goes with everything, I mean even dresses & shorts. Very stylish and not super dresssy but nice dressy yet casual. Im getting another color probably black to switch it up in my wardrobe. A must have for that cool look. Very affordable so buy 2 ! Material is soft & comfy. Perfect for around the house not to heavy yet solid feel. Love it Read more
items.author: Pokerluvr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely Oversized but Great Quality
items.body: Lovely sweater, great quality, super comfy. I'm 5'0 137lbs and I ordered a Small, even though my suggested size was Medium. I dislike anything too snug or tight and I was taking a chance by ordering the small, but now that I've worn this sweater, I should have ordered the XS. I've never worn XS in anything before, but I'm here to say, this cardigan is oversized. So, with my short stature, even the small hangs down mid-thigh. Otherwise, highly recommend!!! Read more
items.author: Deneace Reel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy sweater but a little bright
items.body: This is an attractive cardigan with just the right weight for chilly fall days or to layer in colder temps. I bought the orange color, thinking it would be more pumpkin-ish in color, as pictured. Instead, it is a bright orange thatâ€™s close to neon. Itâ€™s great for casual wear but could be a little bright for the office. I was concerned about the sizing. The site recommended a medium, and Iâ€™m a plus-sized woman. However, based on the size chart I ordered a medium, and it fits well. The fit is slightly boxy but not overly so. I wore it for the first time today and found it quite comfortable. The biggest disappointment is a hole in the side seam. I didnâ€™t notice it until after the window to return it had closed. Fortunately itâ€™s nothing that will cause the sweater to come apart, and Iâ€™ll be able to whip-stitch it together without difficulty. I just hate to have to do that with a new item. Read more
items.author: C. Ribbins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oversized sweater
items.body: This is one of the most comfortable sweaters Iâ€™ve ever bought. Iâ€™ve tried to get more, but theyâ€™re always sold out very comfortable oversized if you like that the buttons are easy to use. The material is very nice soft highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Catherine Young

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Wine Red, Nutmeg, Pink, White, S White, Light Apricot, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
